类 org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.CompressionInputStream
的使用

  • 使用CompressionInputStream的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.hadoop.io.compress  

    • org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中CompressionInputStream的使用

      org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中CompressionInputStream的子类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  BlockDecompressorStream
      A DecompressorStream which works with 'block-based' based compression algorithms, as opposed to 'stream-based' compression algorithms.
      class  DecompressorStream 
      class  SplitCompressionInputStream
      An InputStream covering a range of compressed data.
      返回CompressionInputStream的org.apache.hadoop.io.compress中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      CompressionInputStream SnappyCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given input stream.
      CompressionInputStream Lz4Codec.createInputStream(InputStream in)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given input stream.
      CompressionInputStream GzipCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in) 
      CompressionInputStream DefaultCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in) 
      CompressionInputStream CompressionCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given input stream.
      CompressionInputStream BZip2Codec.createInputStream(InputStream in)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given input stream and return a stream for uncompressed data.
      CompressionInputStream SnappyCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given InputStream with the given Decompressor.
      CompressionInputStream Lz4Codec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given InputStream with the given Decompressor.
      CompressionInputStream GzipCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor) 
      CompressionInputStream DefaultCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor) 
      CompressionInputStream CompressionCodec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given InputStream with the given Decompressor.
      CompressionInputStream BZip2Codec.createInputStream(InputStream in, Decompressor decompressor)
      Create a CompressionInputStream that will read from the given InputStream with the given Decompressor, and return a stream for uncompressed data.
